name: Basket Crows
description:
This game is about two crows that play basketball! You have to fly, steal the ball from your enemy and score flying in circles to the right! (Because these crows are not ambiturner)

C O N T R O L S  

P1: W KEY
P2: UP ARROW KEY

This game was developed in the context of the Train Jam 2019, where its theme was circuitous.

Available for Windows and Mac

C R E D I T S

Jazmin Giolito // twitter.com/jazmingiolito
Audio 

Cristian Gonzalez // twitter.com/explodi
Musician and programmer

And special thanks to Darel Bennet, part of the Amtrak staff and voice actor.
